data.title: Where can I find people that play Animal Crossing for the Switch? I have no friends that have the game.
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 3): if you’re on Facebook, there are groups dedicated solely to Animal Crossing New Horizons. You could ask to join some then post in there asking for friends. There’s also Twitter, Reddit and here on Quora. Just type the game’s name in the search bar in the likes of Quora and Reddit...
